name: Mansion of Spooks
description:
It's Halloween night. You found an ad online for a haunted house. You've got nothing better to do, so you decide to go.

This is a short game made for Scream Jam 2020, where you navigate a haunted house, talk to it's spooky inhabitants, and play spooky games.

This game has horror elements. You've been warned.

Sounds used:
